did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle:
Warren Hope collection of Laura (Riding) Jackson letters,
1973-1974.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Consists of letters sent by Laura (Riding) Jackson to Warren Hope, regarding his biography of Norman Cameron.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Warren Hope wrote a biography of poet Norman Cameron. Laura (Riding) Jackson was a poet, critic, and author best known for her association with the Fugitives in the Thirties, for her literary partnership with Robert Graves, and as the editor of Epilogue.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Consists of letters sent by Laura (Riding) Jackson to Warren Hope, regarding his biography of Norman Cameron.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Warren Hope collection of Laura (Riding) Jackson letters, #6302. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
